item.title: Writing my own 64-bit operating system
item.description: This project is assigned as a course assignment for Computer Organization and Assembly. I made 64-bit operating system using the following given resources/tutorials. Write Your Own 64-bit Operating System Kernel #1 - Boot code and multiboot header Write Your Own 64-bit Operating System Kernel #2 - Stack, long mode and printing using C code Github Repo of the code: https://github.com/abdulmanann/operating-system-assignment Software, Packages and Languages The softwares, packages and languages used were
